segments.text: I see a woman diligently polishing a plate, completely oblivious to the chaos brewing below her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is cascading over the sink, creating a small flood at her feet, but she doesn’t seem to notice at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is so intense, it's almost as if the world around her has vanished.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a pang of concern as I keep my eyes on the puddle that is steadily growing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful through the window, a stark contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And then there's the boy on the stool, stretching toward the cookie jar as if it’s the Holy Grail of childhood treasures.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His position makes me nervous; the stool looks like it could tip over at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn’t the woman paying attention to them?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him is waiting eagerly, her arm raised like she’s anticipating a sweet reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a mix of admiration for their bravery and a sinking feeling in my stomach about what might happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR
